--- title: "Geog 510: GIS and Spatial Analysis for Public Health" date: last-modified date-format: medium output: html_document: theme: flatly toc: yes toc_float: yes toc_depth: 3 --- ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Instructor Information **Instructor:** Dr. Varun Goel **Office:** Callcott 111 \ **Appointment link:** [Click Here](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/675339bb37584ebaa37d12437cb4f286@sc.edu/meetingtype/aKkUKwRTska6ndT42c8OWg2?anonymous&ep=mlink) **Email:** varungoel\@sc.edu ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Course Essentials **Meeting times:** Monday, Wednesday *2:20 pm - 3:35pm*\ **Meeting location:** Callcott 302 **Student Support Hours:** Mon-Wed 1 pm - 2 pm **Appointment link:** [Click Here](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/675339bb37584ebaa37d12437cb4f286@sc.edu/meetingtype/aKkUKwRTska6ndT42c8OWg2?anonymous&ep=mlink) **]GEOG 510 Piazza Discussion Board:** [Click Here](https://piazza.com/sc/spring2025/geog510/home) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Required Text Cromley, E. K., & McLaferty, S. L. (2012). GIS and Public Health (2nd edition). New York: Guilford Press. [**This is available for free via the USC Library!**](https://catalog.lib.unc.edu/catalog/UNCb7325669) I will also post .pdfs of the chapters on blackboard. Additional readings will be posted on blackboard or available online. See the Readings document for a list of all course readings. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Updated Syllabus The latest class syllabus can downloaded [here](./Geog510_GISandHealth_SP25.pdf) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Updated Schedule ------ Please note that this schedule is subject to change (specifically, lecture topics and due dates). Please check this page periodically in case there are any changes ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
WEEK TUES THUR TOPICS DELIVERABLES NOTES
1 01/13/24 01/15/24 Introduction to GEOG 510 and Health Geography; Geographic Concepts and GIS
2 01/22/24 Spatial data fundamentals; Projections and Coordinate Systems; Data Quality and Metadata Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day + snow day (slides to be skimmed before week 3 class)
3 01/27/24 01/29/24 Introduction to Spatial Health Data;
4 02/03/24 02/05/24 A#1 Virtual/Recorded
5 02/10/24 02/12/24 Geocoding, Table and Spatial Join; Data Integration
6 02/17/24 02/19/24 Mapping Health Information and Design; ; GIS Overlay, Distance, Buffer
7 02/24/24 02/26/24 Pattern and Process; Spatial Neighbors and Autocorrelation, Spatial Variation and Clustering
8 03/03/24 03/05/24 Disease Clusters; Grouping and Regionalization A#2
9 Spring Break
10 03/17/24 03/19/24 Applied Autocorrelation/Clustering/Grouping A#3
11 03/24/24 03/26/24 NO CLASS: Away for conference Virtual/Recorded
12 03/31/24 04/02/24 Disease Risk and Diffusion; Ecology of Disease A#4
13 04/07/24 04/09/24 Correlation, Regression, Confounding
14 04/14/24 04/16/24 Spatial Regression Techniques; Temporal Analysis and Change Detection
15 04/21/24 04/23/24 Neighborhoods and Health A#5
16 04/28/24 Access to Health Care; Network Analysis; Spatial Interaction Models Last day of classes
FINAL EXAM 05/05/24 Final Presentation/Peer Assessment; Final paper due Starts at 12:30 pm
````` ::: :::
